I am the Head Elder of the Bronze Door Guild, and the First Elder of the Guild Elder Association. Impressive, eh? What I actually do is humor the old goats in the Seniors Association. So, what brings you here? [Quest _217_TestimonyOfTrust 30531_1|Show Cerecin's letter]
